refnamediv.refpurpose: The ATK interface implemented for UI components which contain tabular or row/column information.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Signals
refsect1.synopsis: "column-deleted" : Run Last "column-inserted" : Run Last "column-reordered" : Run Last "model-changed" : Run Last "row-deleted" : Run Last "row-inserted" : Run Last "row-reordered" : Run Last

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: AtkTable should be implemented by components which present elements ordered via rows and columns. It may also be used to present tree-structured information if the nodes of the trees can be said to contain multiple "columns". Individual elements of an AtkTable are typically referred to as "cells", and these cells are exposed by AtkTable as child AtkObjects of the AtkTable. Both row/column and child-index-based access to these children is provided.
Children of AtkTable are frequently "lightweight" objects, that is, they may not have backing widgets in the host UI toolkit. They are therefore often transient.

Since tables are often very complex, AtkTable includes provision for offering simplified summary information, as well as row and column headers and captions. Headers and captions are AtkObjects which may implement other interfaces (AtkText, AtkImage, etc.) as appropriate. AtkTable summaries may themselves be (simplified) AtkTables, etc.

refsect2.title: AtkTable
refsect2.para: The AtkTable structure does not contain any fields.

refsect2.title: atk_table_ref_at ()
refsect2.para: Get a reference to the table cell at row, column.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a row in table
a gint representing a column in table
a AtkObject* representing the referred to accessible

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_index_at ()
refsect2.para: Gets a gint representing the index at the specified row and column.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a row in table
a gint representing a column in table
a gint representing the index at specified position. The value -1 is returned if the object at row,column is not a child of table or table does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_column_at_index ()
refsect2.para: Gets a gint representing the column at the specified index_.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableInterface
a gint representing an index in table
a gint representing the column at the specified index, or -1 if the table does not implement this interface

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_row_at_index ()
refsect2.para: Gets a gint representing the row at the specified index_.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableInterface
a gint representing an index in table
a gint representing the row at the specified index, or -1 if the table does not implement this interface

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_n_columns ()
refsect2.para: Gets the number of columns in the table.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing the number of columns, or 0 if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_n_rows ()
refsect2.para: Gets the number of rows in the table.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing the number of rows, or 0 if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_column_extent_at ()
refsect2.para: Gets the number of columns occupied by the accessible object at the specified row and column in the table.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a row in table
a gint representing a column in table
a gint representing the column extent at specified position, or 0 if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_row_extent_at ()
refsect2.para: Gets the number of rows occupied by the accessible object at a specified row and column in the table.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a row in table
a gint representing a column in table
a gint representing the row extent at specified position, or 0 if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_caption ()
refsect2.para: Gets the caption for the table.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableInterface
a AtkObject* representing the table caption, or NULL if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_column_description ()
refsect2.para: Gets the description text of the specified column in the table

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a column in table
a gchar* representing the column description, or NULL if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_row_description ()
refsect2.para: Gets the description text of the specified row in the table

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a row in table
a gchar* representing the row description, or NULL if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_column_header ()
refsect2.para: Gets the column header of a specified column in an accessible table.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a column in the table
a AtkObject* representing the specified column header, or NULL if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_row_header ()
refsect2.para: Gets the row header of a specified row in an accessible table.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a row in the table
a AtkObject* representing the specified row header, or NULL if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_summary ()
refsect2.para: Gets the summary description of the table.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a AtkObject* representing a summary description of the table, or zero if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_set_caption ()
refsect2.para: Sets the caption for the table.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a AtkObject representing the caption to set for table

refsect2.title: atk_table_set_row_description ()
refsect2.para: Sets the description text for the specified row of table.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a row in table
a gchar representing the description text to set for the specified row of table

refsect2.title: atk_table_set_column_description ()
refsect2.para: Sets the description text for the specified column of the table.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a column in table
a gchar representing the description text to set for the specified column of the table

refsect2.title: atk_table_set_row_header ()
refsect2.para: Sets the specified row header to header.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a row in table
an AtkTable

refsect2.title: atk_table_set_column_header ()
refsect2.para: Sets the specified column header to header.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a column in table
an AtkTable

refsect2.title: atk_table_set_summary ()
refsect2.para: Sets the summary description of the table.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
an AtkObject representing the summary description to set for table

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_selected_columns ()
refsect2.para: Gets the selected columns of the table by initializing **selected with the selected column numbers. This array should be freed by the caller.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint** that is to contain the selected columns numbers
a gint representing the number of selected columns, or 0 if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_get_selected_rows ()
refsect2.para: Gets the selected rows of the table by initializing **selected with the selected row numbers. This array should be freed by the caller.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint** that is to contain the selected row numbers
a gint representing the number of selected rows, or zero if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_is_column_selected ()
refsect2.para: Gets a boolean value indicating whether the specified column is selected

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a column in table
a gboolean representing if the column is selected, or 0 if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_is_row_selected ()
refsect2.para: Gets a boolean value indicating whether the specified row is selected

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a row in table
a gboolean representing if the row is selected, or 0 if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_is_selected ()
refsect2.para: Gets a boolean value indicating whether the accessible object at the specified row and column is selected

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a row in table
a gint representing a column in table
a gboolean representing if the cell is selected, or 0 if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_add_column_selection ()
refsect2.para: Adds the specified column to the selection.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a column in table
a gboolean representing if the column was successfully added to the selection, or 0 if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_add_row_selection ()
refsect2.para: Adds the specified row to the selection.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a row in table
a gboolean representing if row was successfully added to selection, or 0 if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_remove_column_selection ()
refsect2.para: Adds the specified column to the selection.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a column in table
a gboolean representing if the column was successfully removed from the selection, or 0 if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: atk_table_remove_row_selection ()
refsect2.para: Removes the specified row from the selection.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkTableIface
a gint representing a row in table
a gboolean representing if the row was successfully removed from the selection, or 0 if value does not implement this interface.

refsect2.title: The "column-deleted" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (AtkTable *atktable, gint arg1, gint arg2, gpointer user_data) : Run Last
refsect2.para: The "column-deleted" signal is emitted by an object which implements the AtkTable interface when a column is deleted.

listitem.simpara: the object which received the signal.
The index of the first column deleted.
The number of columns deleted.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The "column-inserted" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (AtkTable *atktable, gint arg1, gint arg2, gpointer user_data) : Run Last
refsect2.para: The "column-inserted" signal is emitted by an object which implements the AtkTable interface when a column is inserted.

listitem.simpara: the object which received the signal.
The index of the column inserted.
The number of colums inserted.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The "column-reordered" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (AtkTable *atktable, gpointer user_data) : Run Last
refsect2.para: The "column-reordered" signal is emitted by an object which implements the AtkTable interface when the columns are reordered.

listitem.simpara: the object which received the signal.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The "model-changed" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (AtkTable *atktable, gpointer user_data) : Run Last
refsect2.para: The "model-changed" signal is emitted by an object which implements the AtkTable interface when the model displayed by the table changes.

listitem.simpara: the object which received the signal.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The "row-deleted" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (AtkTable *atktable, gint arg1, gint arg2, gpointer user_data) : Run Last
refsect2.para: The "row-deleted" signal is emitted by an object which implements the AtkTable interface when a column is inserted.

listitem.simpara: the object which received the signal.
The index of the first row deleted.
The number of rows deleted.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The "row-inserted" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (AtkTable *atktable, gint arg1, gint arg2, gpointer user_data) : Run Last
refsect2.para: The "row-inserted" signal is emitted by an object which implements the AtkTable interface when a column is inserted.

listitem.simpara: the object which received the signal.
The index of the first row deleted.
The number of rows deleted.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The "row-reordered" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (AtkTable *atktable, gpointer user_data) : Run Last
refsect2.para: The "row-reordered" signal is emitted by an object which implements the AtkTable interface when the columns are reordered.

listitem.simpara: the object which received the signal.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.
